# bitdump

Dump bittorrent messages from the network. Cannot (yet) handle encrypted
bittorrent traffic.

```
$ sudo ./bitdump
Unchoke
Unchoke
Handshake: BitTorrent protocol: 2D6C74304436302D40704AB020E11255678510A2 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000
Handshake: BitTorrent protocol: 2D5452323932302D703137763034663178396435 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000
Bitfield ffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffff
Handshake: BitTorrent protocol: 2D6C74304437302D5197BC0B7833CA028D4D0808 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000
Handshake: BitTorrent protocol: 2D4254376134532D59AE3A752EF0FF6161705517 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000
Handshake: BitTorrent protocol: 2D4254376134532D59AECBDCB317F48F6C11755D 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000
Handshake: BitTorrent protocol: 2D5452323834302D3035676B7A33646372396C6A 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000
Handshake: BitTorrent protocol: 2D6C74304434302DC0CFD6CB630A517CDF91D172 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000
Bitfield ffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffff
Handshake: BitTorrent protocol: 2D5452323934302D656D71356A736332347A6430 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000
Bitfield ffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffff
Handshake: BitTorrent protocol: 2D5452323932302D30716D35766C6F35667A3770 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000
```
